article_title: Q&A: James Klein, American Benefits Council
article_text: Before its current term ends in June, the U.S. Supreme Court will hand down a ruling that will affect millions of U.S. residents: the legality of a portion of 2012 IRS rules that authorize federal health insurance premium subsidies to eligible lower-income individuals receiving coverage through the federal insurance exchange. article_summary:
James Klein, president of the American Benefits Council in
Before its current term ends in June, the U.S. Supreme Court will hand down a ruling that will affect millions of U.S. residents: the legality of a portion of 2012 IRS rules that authorize federal health insurance premium subsidies to eligible lower-income individuals receiving coverage through the federal insurance exchange.
